trans-unit.source: Provides information about a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell" /> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell" /> 的相关信息提供给具有辅助功能的客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Windows Forms includes built-in accessibility support that allows your application to work with accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: Windows 窗体包括允许你的应用程序以使用辅助功能客户端应用程序的内置辅助功能支持。

trans-unit.source: Examples of accessibility client applications include screen enlarger and reviewer utilities, voice input utilities, on-screen keyboards, alternative input devices, and keyboard enhancement utilities.
trans-unit.target: 辅助功能客户端应用程序的示例包括屏幕放大器和审阅者实用工具、 语音输入的实用工具、 屏幕键盘、 其他输入的设备，以及键盘增强实用工具。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> class to provide information about a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject>类继承自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>类来提供以下信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>辅助功能客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Each class that represents a visual part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>—such as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>—also contains a class that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> to provide information about the containing class and perform actions on behalf of accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 每个类表示的可视部件<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>-如<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>， <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell>，<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRow>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>-还包含继承自的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>提供有关包含的类信息和执行代表辅助功能客户端应用程序的操作。

trans-unit.source: There are instances when you will want to provide additional information, such as the name or description of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control, to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 有实例时想要提供其他信息，例如名称或描述<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件，辅助功能客户端应用程序。

trans-unit.source: There are two ways of providing this additional information.
trans-unit.target: 有两种方法来提供这些额外信息。

trans-unit.source: To provide limited accessibility information for existing controls, set the control's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A> property values, which will be reported to accessibility client applications.
trans-unit.target: 若要提供有限的辅助功能信息供现有控件，设置控件的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleName%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDescription%2A>将报告给具有辅助功能客户端应用程序的属性值。

trans-unit.source: You should change the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A> property values only in rare situations, such as if you make a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> look like a list.
trans-unit.target: 应更改<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleDefaultActionDescription%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.AccessibleRole%2A>属性值仅在极少数情况下，例如，如果你使<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>如下所示列表。

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, you might require more accessibility information or different accessibility actions to be included with your custom <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>.
trans-unit.target: 有时，你可能需要更多的辅助功能信息或可访问性不同操作，将您的自定义包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>。

trans-unit.source: To customize accessibility, you can write your own class that derives from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject> classes and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义可访问性，你可以编写您自己的类派生自<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataGridViewAccessibleObject>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject>类并重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you are writing a custom row header cell that implements unique custom actions, such as special hit testing within your cell, you should create a class that inherits from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject> class and override the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你正在编写实现唯一的自定义操作，例如在你的单元格中，特殊命中测试的自定义的行标题单元格应创建继承自的类<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.DataGridViewRowHeaderCellAccessibleObject>类并重写<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewRowHeaderCell.CreateAccessibilityInstance%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> exposes its data structure by using <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole> values to define the data table hierarchy.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>使用来公开其数据结构<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleRole>值来定义数据表层次结构。

trans-unit.source: For more information on exposing data tables to Microsoft Active Accessibility, see "Exposing Data Tables through Microsoft Active Accessibility" in the MSDN library at http://msdn.microsoft.com/library.
trans-unit.target: 公开到 Microsoft Active Accessibility 数据表的详细信息，请参阅"公开数据表通过 Microsoft Active Accessibility"在 MSDN 库中http://msdn.microsoft.com/library。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell" /> that owns the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the location and size of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 获取辅助性对象的位置和大小。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the bounds of the accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 表示辅助性对象的边界的 <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets a description of the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" /> 的默认操作的说明。

trans-unit.source: The string "Press to Select All" if the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect" /> property is <see langword="true" />; otherwise, an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 如果 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，则为字符串“Press to Select All”（按下以全部选定）；否则为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: Performs the default action of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.DoDefaultAction%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.SelectAll%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
to call unmanaged code.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
Gets the name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
The name of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.

If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A> property of the owning <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> has been set, this property returns <xref:System.String.Empty>.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.Value%2A>属性所属的<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>已设置，此属性返回<xref:System.String.Empty>。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, this property returns "Top Left Header Cell" if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is <xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>, and "Top Right Header Cell" otherwise.
trans-unit.target: 否则，此属性将返回"顶部左侧标题单元格"如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.RightToLeft%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>控件是<xref:System.Windows.Forms.RightToLeft.No>，和"顶部右侧标题单元格"否则为。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation" /> values.
Navigates to another accessible object.
trans-unit.target: 定位到另一个辅助性对象。

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject" /> that represents an object in the specified direction.

When you specify the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next> value for `navigationDirection`, the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> method returns an <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject> that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell> for the first column.
trans-unit.target: 当指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Next>值`navigationDirection`、<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A>方法返回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject>表示<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnHeaderCell>的第一列。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> returns the same object if you specify <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Right> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Left> when right-to-left support is enabled.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.Navigate%2A> 返回相同的对象，如果你指定<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Right>或<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation.Left>在启用从右向左的支持。

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleNavigation> values return `null`.
to call unmanaged code.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection" /> values.
Modifies the selection in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> control or sets input focus to the control.
trans-unit.target: 修改 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView" /> 控件中的选择或将输入焦点设置到该控件上。

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the action performed for each `flags` value.
trans-unit.target: 下表描述每个执行的操作`flags`值。

trans-unit.source: Parameter value
Action
Sets input focus to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control.
If the control contains any visible cells, sets focus to the cell in the first row and column.
trans-unit.target: 如果控件包含任何可见的单元格，第一个行和列中将焦点设置到单元格。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A> property value is `true`, selects all cells in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.MultiSelect%2A>属性值是`true`，选择控件中的所有单元格。

trans-unit.source: If the `flags` value does not contain the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.AddSelection> value, clears the selection in the control.
trans-unit.target: 如果`flags`值不包含<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection.AddSelection>值时，请清除在控件中的选择。

trans-unit.source: All other <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleSelection> values
No action is taken.
The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell.DataGridViewCellAccessibleObject.Owner" /> property value is <see langword="null" />.
to call unmanaged code.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
Gets the state of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject" />.
A bitwise combination of <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates" /> values.
The default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable" />.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> property value always includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selectable> value.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected> value if all visible cells in the control are selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A>值包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Selected>时选择控件中的所有可见的单元格的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A> value includes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Offscreen> value if the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell> is hidden.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCellAccessibleObject.State%2A>值包括<xref:System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleStates.Offscreen>如果值为<xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell>处于隐藏状态。

trans-unit.source: The value of the containing <see cref="T:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewTopLeftHeaderCell" />.
Always returns <see cref="F:System.String.Empty" />.
to call unmanaged code.
Demand value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction.Demand" />.
Permission value: <see cref="F:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityPermissionFlag.UnmanagedCode" />
